vulnerability_findings.name: array-length-outside-loop
vulnerability_findings.message: Caching the array length outside a loop saves reading it on each iteration, as long as the array's length is not changed during the loop.

vulnerability_findings.name: use-custom-error-not-require
vulnerability_findings.vulnerability_code: require(msg.sender == admin, "only admin may initialize the market");
vulnerability_findings.message: Consider using custom errors as they are more gas efficient while allowing developers  to describe the error in detail using NatSpec.

vulnerability_findings.name: use-multiple-require
vulnerability_findings.vulnerability_code: require(accrualBlockNumber == 0 && borrowIndex == 0, "market may only be initialized once");
vulnerability_findings.message: Using multiple require statements is cheaper than using && multiple check combinations. There are more advantages, such as easier to read code and better coverage reports.

vulnerability_findings.name: use-prefix-increment-not-postfix
vulnerability_findings.message: Consider using the prefix increment expression whenever the return value is not needed. The prefix increment expression is cheaper in terms of gas.

vulnerability_findings.name: use-short-revert-string
vulnerability_findings.vulnerability_code: require(msg.sender == admin, "only admin may initialize the market");
vulnerability_findings.message: Shortening revert strings to fit in 32 bytes will decrease gas costs for deployment and  gas costs when the revert condition has been met.

vulnerability_findings.name: compound-borrowfresh-reentrancy
vulnerability_findings.message: Function borrowFresh() in Compound performs state update after doTransferOut()

vulnerability_findings.name: arbitrary-send
vulnerability_findings.message:
Maximillion.repayBehalfExplicit (Maximillion.sol#2850-2860) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- cEther_.repayBorrowBehalf.value(borrows)(borrower) (Maximillion.sol#2854-2855)

vulnerability_findings.name: erc20-interface
vulnerability_findings.message:
EIP20NonStandardInterface (Maximillion.sol#1152-1214) has incorrect ERC20 function interface(s):
	-transfer (Maximillion.sol#1178)
	-transferFrom (Maximillion.sol#1192)

vulnerability_findings.name: incorrect-equality
vulnerability_findings.message:
CEther.getCashPrior (Maximillion.sol#2768-2774) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- require(bool)(err == MathError.NO_ERROR)

vulnerability_findings.name: reentrancy-no-eth
vulnerability_findings.message:
Reentrancy in CToken._addReservesInternal (Maximillion.sol#2435-2447):
	External calls:
	- error = accrueInterest() (Maximillion.sol#2436-2437)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- totalReserves (Maximillion.sol#2443-2444)

vulnerability_findings.name: reentrancy-no-eth
vulnerability_findings.message:
Reentrancy in CToken._reduceReserves (Maximillion.sol#2498-2508):
	External calls:
	- error = accrueInterest() (Maximillion.sol#2499-2500)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- totalReserves (Maximillion.sol#2505-2506)

vulnerability_findings.name: reentrancy-no-eth
vulnerability_findings.message:
Reentrancy in CToken._setComptroller (Maximillion.sol#2367-2386):
	External calls:
	- require(bool,string)(newComptroller.isComptroller(),marker method returned false) (Maximillion.sol#2375-2376)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- comptroller (Maximillion.sol#2378-2379)

vulnerability_findings.name: reentrancy-no-eth
vulnerability_findings.message:
Reentrancy in CToken._setInterestRateModel (Maximillion.sol#2563-2573):
	External calls:
	- error = accrueInterest() (Maximillion.sol#2564-2565)
	- _setInterestRateModelFresh(newInterestRateModel) (Maximillion.sol#2570-2571)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- interestRateModel (Maximillion.sol#2570-2571)

vulnerability_findings.name: reentrancy-no-eth
vulnerability_findings.message:
Reentrancy in CToken._setInterestRateModelFresh (Maximillion.sol#2579-2609):

	- require(bool,string)(newInterestRateModel.isInterestRateModel(),marker method returned false) (Maximillion.sol#2598-2600)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- interestRateModel (Maximillion.sol#2601-2603)

vulnerability_findings.message:
Reentrancy in CToken._setReserveFactor (Maximillion.sol#2391-2401):

vulnerability_findings.name: reentrancy-no-eth
vulnerability_findings.message:
Reentrancy in CToken.accrueInterest (Maximillion.sol#1599-1677):
	External calls:
	- borrowRateMantissa = interestRateModel.getBorrowRate(cashPrior,borrowsPrior,reservesPrior) (Maximillion.sol#1616)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- accrualBlockNumber (Maximillion.sol#1668)
	- borrowIndex (Maximillion.sol#1669)
	- totalBorrows (Maximillion.sol#1670)
	- totalReserves (Maximillion.sol#1671)

vulnerability_findings.message:
Reentrancy in CToken.borrowInternal (Maximillion.sol#1929-1937):
	External calls:
	- error = accrueInterest() (Maximillion.sol#1930)
	- borrowFresh(msg.sender,borrowAmount) (Maximillion.sol#1936)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- totalBorrows (Maximillion.sol#1936)

vulnerability_findings.name: reentrancy-no-eth
vulnerability_findings.message:
Reentrancy in CEther.constructor (Maximillion.sol#2665-2682):
	External calls:
	- initialize(comptroller_,interestRateModel_,initialExchangeRateMantissa_,name_,symbol_,decimals_) (Maximillion.sol#2675-2677)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- admin (Maximillion.sol#2678-2679)

Reentrancy in CToken.initialize (Maximillion.sol#1241-1272):

vulnerability_findings.message:
Reentrancy in CToken.liquidateBorrowInternal (Maximillion.sol#2141-2156):
	External calls:
	- error = accrueInterest() (Maximillion.sol#2142)
	- error = cTokenCollateral.accrueInterest() (Maximillion.sol#2148)
	- liquidateBorrowFresh(msg.sender,borrower,repayAmount,cTokenCollateral) (Maximillion.sol#2155)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- totalBorrows (Maximillion.sol#2155)

	- totalSupply (Maximillion.sol#1911)

vulnerability_findings.name: shadowing-local
vulnerability_findings.vulnerability_code: (MathError err, Exp memory fraction) = divScalarByExp(scalar, divisor);
vulnerability_findings.message:
Exponential.divScalarByExpTruncate.fraction (local variable @ Maximillion.sol#859) shadows:
	- Exponential.fraction (function @ Maximillion.sol#1073-1075)

vulnerability_findings.name: reentrancy-benign
vulnerability_findings.message:
Reentrancy in CToken.borrowFresh (Maximillion.sol#1951-2014):
	External calls:
	- allowed = comptroller.borrowAllowed(address(this),borrower,borrowAmount) (Maximillion.sol#1953)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- accountBorrows (Maximillion.sol#2003)
	- accountBorrows (Maximillion.sol#2004)
	- totalBorrows (Maximillion.sol#2005)

vulnerability_findings.name: reentrancy-benign

Reentrancy in CToken.initialize (Maximillion.sol#1241-1272):
	External calls:
	- err = _setComptroller(comptroller_) (Maximillion.sol#1255)
	- err = _setInterestRateModelFresh(interestRateModel_) (Maximillion.sol#1263)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- _notEntered (Maximillion.sol#1271)
	- decimals (Maximillion.sol#1268)
	- name (Maximillion.sol#1266)
	- symbol (Maximillion.sol#1267)

Reentrancy in CToken.redeemFresh (Maximillion.sol#1828-1922):

vulnerability_findings.name: solc-version
vulnerability_findings.message:
Detected issues with version pragma in Maximillion.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.5.16 (Maximillion.sol#3): it allows old versions
	- pragma solidity^0.5.16 (Maximillion.sol#77): it allows old versions
	- pragma solidity^0.5.16 (Maximillion.sol#110): it allows old versions
	- pragma solidity^0.5.16 (Maximillion.sol#413): it allows old versions
	- pragma solidity^0.5.16 (Maximillion.sol#623): it allows old versions
	- pragma solidity^0.5.16 (Maximillion.sol#711): it allows old versions
	- pragma solidity^0.5.16 (Maximillion.sol#1080): it allows old versions
